"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a5cf76636872230e00026c#post_55a5cf76636872230e00026c
I hate modern shonen that is in the same vein as naruto.

I *might* watch jojo in a couple weeks once I get my exams done with cause I'll have *some* free time.


My problem with modern shonen is multiple in that they're often absurdly obsessed with the idea of redeemable villains, the hero being a fucking idiot that won't kill, asspulls to justify coming up with bullshit excuses to say that the hero didn't kill a villain and emo characters.

If a villain in a anime gets off on killing and has no intention of changing he needs to fucking go; don't go "well the villain had a heart condition we never spoke of before so the hero didn't kill the villain; the villain just died from overexerting himself" bullshit; just fucking kill him.


If I had to summarize why I'm put off so much by modern shonen in one sentence it would be "Sasuke did everything wrong"
